entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Copy and Paste with double quotes is inserting backslash #68414
  • Format document does not honor final newline #68413
  • Implicitly Captured Closure - use attribute to instruct compiler to create separate DisplayClasses #68407
  • Add documentation for known Features values #68406
    17.7
  • Expand Generator ETW telemetry to include step information #68402
    17.7

Closed

  • CS0246 erroneously reported on named attribute arguments for unresolved attribute #68370
    17.7
  • dotnet format fails with "Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis, Version=4.6.0.0...'. The system cannot find the file specified." #68115

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #68418
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Package Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Test.Utilities for razor #68417
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allocate less in GetTypeByMetadataName #68415
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid cancellation exceptions in async queue implementation #68412
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2192546 #68411
  • add review comment to sb files #68409
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.7 #68419
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix issues with pkgdef generation #68398
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Don't bind named members on missing attribute #68388
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #68416
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #68405
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Clear dead links to feature branches in `Language Feature Status.md` #68317
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #68404
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • add Version.Details entries for source-build product build #68371
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix HasFileLocalTypes check for constructed types #68386
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use GetResult(out Exception) method for awaits #67487
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged, Backlog
  • Don't give duplicate member error for explicit implementations of different file-local interfaces with same source name #68331
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Implement IOperation support for inline array access #68373
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Add new (hopefully easier) telemetry mechanism #68261
    Area-IDE, untriaged
